description: Interface for Uniswap V3 nonfungible position manager

functions.name: mint
functions.signature: function mint(MintParams calldata params) external payable returns (uint256 tokenId, uint128 liquidity, uint256 amount0, uint256 amount1)
functions.description: Creates a new position wrapped in a NFT

functions.name: increaseLiquidity
functions.signature: function increaseLiquidity(IncreaseLiquidityParams calldata params) external payable returns (uint128 liquidity, uint256 amount0, uint256 amount1)
functions.description: Increases liquidity in the current range

functions.name: decreaseLiquidity
functions.signature: function decreaseLiquidity(DecreaseLiquidityParams calldata params) external payable returns (uint256 amount0, uint256 amount1)
functions.description: Decreases liquidity in the current range

functions.name: collect
functions.signature: function collect(CollectParams calldata params) external payable returns (uint256 amount0, uint256 amount1)
functions.description: Collects up to a maximum amount of fees owed to a specific position to the recipient

functions.name: positions
functions.signature: function positions(uint256 tokenId) external view returns (uint96 nonce, address operator, address token0, address token1, uint24 fee, int24 tickLower, int24 tickUpper, uint128 liquidity, uint256 feeGrowthInside0LastX128, uint256 feeGrowthInside1LastX128, uint128 tokensOwed0, uint128 tokensOwed1)
functions.description: Returns the position information associated with a given token ID

structs.name: MintParams
structs.fields: token0, token1, fee, tickLower, tickUpper, amount0Desired, amount1Desired, amount0Min, amount1Min, recipient, deadline
